title: The Shir Khan Prophecy
description: The Shir Khan Prophecy - two British MI6 Agents, Kane Rhodes and Brian Jones, have been sent to Afghanistan to infiltrate the notorious Al-Jahid Cult who, for the past few years, have been grooming prominent people throughout the world, to become major terrorists.The Cult had only recently been uncovered when Kane and Brian helped to thwart a major terrorist attack on Washington.The two agents are aided by Mo Enayetullah, an undercover CIA field agent who was to play a vital part in the investigation.Infiltrating the Cult had been comparatively easy; the uncovered extent of the potential danger however, had sent warning tremors across the whole of the Western world and it was left to a solitary CIA agent to pick up the trail.
author: John Lock
